description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

Count layers up to max of 6. Layers are the canopy species or ground non-forest types. Because of its horizontal structure, the present schema doesn't allow to consider verticality. Thus understory species are not considered as a layer. Zero counted as null for species and non-forest codes. Validation returns UNKNOWN if num_of_layers is zero.
Converts source area from m2 to ha
